export const GET_CLIENT_QUERY = gql`
query getIndividualType($id:String!) {
  individualClient(id:$id)
  {
    id
    createdAt
    lastName
    email
    deletedAt
    updatedAt
    firstName
    lastName
    occupation
    town
    dateOfBirth
    gender
    phoneNumber
    idNumber
    kraPin
    postalAddress
    agency{
      id
      name
      agencyEmail
    }
}
}`;
export const ADD_NEW_CLIENT = gql`
mutation createIndividualClient(
    $email: String!
    $firstName: String!
    $lastName: String!
    $phoneNumber: String!
    $surname: String!
    $town: String!
    $occupation: String!
    $dateOfBirth: Date!
    $gender:  String!
    $idNumber: Int!
    $kraPin: String!
) {
createIndividualClient(
  input:{
    email: $email
    firstName: $firstName
    lastName: $lastName
    phoneNumber: $phoneNumber
    surname: $surname
    town: $town
    occupation: $occupation
    dateOfBirth: $dateOfBirth
    gender: $gender
    idNumber: $idNumber
    kraPin: $kraPin
  }){
    status
    message
    individualClient {
      id
      email
      firstName
      isActive
      phoneNumber
      agency {
        id
        name
        agencyEmail
      }
    }
  }
}
`;

sourcesContent:
import gql from 'graphql-tag';

export const GET_CLIENT_QUERY = gql`
query getIndividualType($id:String!) {
  individualClient(id:$id)
  {
    id
    createdAt
    lastName
    email
    deletedAt
    updatedAt
    firstName
    lastName
    occupation
    town
    dateOfBirth
    gender
    phoneNumber
    idNumber
    kraPin
    postalAddress
    agency{
      id
      name
      agencyEmail
    }
}
}`

export const ADD_NEW_CLIENT = gql`
mutation createIndividualClient(
    $email: String!
    $firstName: String!
    $lastName: String!
    $phoneNumber: String!
    $surname: String!
    $town: String!
    $occupation: String!
    $dateOfBirth: Date!
    $gender:  String!
    $idNumber: Int!
    $kraPin: String!
) {
createIndividualClient(
  input:{
    email: $email
    firstName: $firstName
    lastName: $lastName
    phoneNumber: $phoneNumber
    surname: $surname
    town: $town
    occupation: $occupation
    dateOfBirth: $dateOfBirth
    gender: $gender
    idNumber: $idNumber
    kraPin: $kraPin
  }){
    status
    message
    individualClient {
      id
      email
      firstName
      isActive
      phoneNumber
      agency {
        id
        name
        agencyEmail
      }
    }
  }
}
`
